title: Ordyx
description:
Ordyx POS is the latest point of sale for bars, restaurants, nightclubs, fine dining, and more.

​Using only the most advanced technology, Ordyx provides you with the ongoing, reliable service needed for your business to flourish. Our user-friendly and simple-to-learn system uses a remote back of the house, and a cloud-based front of the house so that you never need to worry in the event of your store going offline.
